website_summaries.verdict: Versatile, effective, and reliable. Value price.
pros: Unique oval shape is large enough to move pieces of almost any size
Capable of moving furniture smoothly without floor damage
cons: They may be a bit too large for smaller furniture, and the padding is on the thin side

customer_reviews.title: A must for rearranging big furniture.
customer_reviews.text: Moved a huge four poster bed myself. My son could not believe it! Used the lever lifting device to place the pads under each post and slid the pads under each one of the posts. You gotta have them for those big heavy jobs! This bed would have had to be dismantled otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: recent customer

customer_reviews.title: I Gave These Movers A BIG CHALLENGE
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical that these sliders would handle the antique monstrosity I needed to move. The fact that I had to get a 2.5 ton hydraulic floor jack just to get this 800+ pound cabinet high enough to slide the movers under (see picture) tells you the challenge. But after inserting the movers I am now able to slide the cabinet while filming with one hand (see video). Super Sliders said "challenge accepted"!
customer_reviews.author: J.W.

customer_reviews.title: Not effective-poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Wouldn’t order again. Should have returned. These did not hold up to moving heavy furniture. They also became scratched easily so I didn’t want to attempt using on hardwood floors. Maybe these were meant for carpet use only? There are many less expensive ones that provided better usage.
customer_reviews.author: ann

customer_reviews.title: Worthless
customer_reviews.text: These things created more problems than they solved. They do not stay in place. They pop out and become eyesores underneath the furniture/appliance, if they even stay under the item at all. Returned and replaced locally for 5 bucks and have had no issues.
customer_reviews.author: j.r.m.

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: 31 weeks pregnant (in full nesting mode) I was able to rearrange furniture. Slid across my carpeted floor like butter. I’m really surprised how easy it was. Moved a very heavy dresser from my bedroom to kids bedroom. Nothing negative to say about these. Absolute must have when moving furniture. These work! Edited to add more pictures* This Barbie dresser (mine when I was a kid) now given to my twin girls. Is a pain in the a to move. This dresser is so light but so hard to push. With these furniture sliders it made it so pleasant. I can’t get enough of using these things.
customer_reviews.author: TriSaraht0ps

customer_reviews.title: They work when new, stop working when deformed and compressed
customer_reviews.text: Like: They work when new. Dislike: The plastic portion of the slider is too weak and bends!!! If your furniture has legs, with a "footprint," say the diameter of a quarter, its weight will eventually compress and deform, say "push out," both the the rubber , as well as the plastic, portions of the slider. Thereafter, the "pushed out" portion of the slider will start to "sink into" the carpet, making it difficult to slide. The solution is to insert something, say a "washer," to broaden the diameter of the leg, to distribute its weight over a larger area of the slider.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Made me be Super Woman
customer_reviews.text: With this, I rearranged my guest bedroom <slash> new home office. I was able to move the queen size bed with ease without having to take off the mattress and box spring. The wooden bed frame left an imprint on the slider, of course and I wondered how it would impact the reuse factor. But after an hour or so, the pad bounced back to almost 100%. I'm impressed with is gadget and would definitely recommend it for your moving needs. Oh, and did I mention that I moved the 'fully loaded' queen size bed ALL BY MYSELF? :)
customer_reviews.author: Elke Beyer

customer_reviews.title: Makes moving large furniture on carpet, a lot easier
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sliders. Perfect for moving heavy large furniture/ objects around on carpet. Very easy to push and maneuver furniture around with ease. The only note of caution I have for users is; be very careful when you attempt to put these under large heavy furniture and especially tall pieces.. Remember, you'll have to lift the furniture a small way to get these placed under, and then again to remove them. Nothing but positive things to say about the product. Sturdy and long-lasting. Get two packs for when you're re-arranging large furnitire in a room. Makes life easier.
customer_reviews.author: JayGee

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: These furniture sliders are amazing! I moved a dresser and was aghast to discover the dust and "stuff" behind it, so decided to move all of the furniture in our carpeted house. We have a large, 100+ pound wardrobe that even my burly husband could barley move. Once we put these underneath we can move it quite well. We used the extras for a large dresser which I can now move by myself, and will be keeping them in place. These sliders are really big and may get in the way or look funny, so consider getting the smaller size unless you have a really large item.
customer_reviews.author: Naledi

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfying
customer_reviews.text: This is very helpful for those people that like to do things for themselves. I found it very easy to place under my furniture and move them around the carpet. I've read the reviews about how they don't slide or how the plastic isn't strong and punctures the sliders. I have personally found this to be false. People who have made these statements use the carpet sliders on surfaces other than carpet and theu put thebsliders on heavy pointy edges. Common sense goes along away. Use the product correctly and you won't be disappointed! I need to buy more. Very satisfied customer
customer_reviews.author: Tommy Harmon

customer_reviews.title: Call me superman for I move tables with ease!
customer_reviews.text: When I first looked at this product, I wondered if I would be disappointed because I had to move move the full sized pool table in the photo. This little gadget is amazing, all I had to do was lift each leg and place it on the slider and then push the pool table across the (carpeted) room. I did this with ease and barely broke a sweat. It's not often I'm amazed by a product like I was with this one. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Twiggenberries

customer_reviews.title: Very thin plastic and deform easily
customer_reviews.text: The plastic is very lightweight and heavy objects will deform the slider very easily. Don't leave anything heavy on them for long or they will be unusable.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for anyone who doesn’t have a significant other that can help
customer_reviews.text: These REALLY work. I have an “L” shaped couch and I can’t move one end without worrying about breaking the frame. I placed these under all the legs (the ones deep under the couch as well). It was a hard job but once I got them under there I could move the whole couch by myself and vacuum behind it. I have left them under the legs just Incase I need to move it again. You don’t really notice them. Pick a color that matches the legs so you can leave them in place if you want to.
customer_reviews.author: Rose Garden

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for single people
customer_reviews.text: I am a widow and hate having to ask for help. I had to move a heavy piece of furniture and these made me feel like superwoman. The furniture was deep into the carpet and i couldn't lift it to slide this under at first. My inner MacGuyver kicked in and i got a large straight blade screwdriver and a hammer and tapped the screwdriver under the furniture a tiny bit which was all i needed to slide this in and then i was able to move it with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Cherie B

customer_reviews.title: Easy to move around.
customer_reviews.text: The most important feature of the Super Sliders is it makes moving my furniture around very easily. I use it to move my heavy power lift recliner around, which is what I have to do every day, twice a day. I am wheelchair-bound and sleep in my power lift recliner all the time rather than a bed. I have to move my recliner around before and after each night's sleep, every day. Super Slider makes it easy to do while sitting in a wheelchair.
customer_reviews.author: Fred C. Gilmer

customer_reviews.title: Versatile furniture mover and home workout tool!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to help move some heavy furniture on carpet and are super effective. You place these on each of the corners of your furniture and can slide it around fairly easy depending on the weight and size. These have a very thick strong foam on the top side and super smooth plastic on the bottom. Now on top of that I use these to workout on my carpet and do mountain climbers and push up variations!
customer_reviews.author: Dad's Dojo

customer_reviews.title: Recommended!
customer_reviews.text: Worked like a charm! My dad and husband loved how easy it was to use, move, and without breaking their backs. Took them less than 5 minutes to move 2 huge floor to ceiling wardrobe dressers across to another room in the house and on the carpet. When we first moved into our house, we needed 5 males to carry each one plus a blanket to slide and pull from the carpet & they all broke a sweat. This time took only 2 with no sweat. They were really impress how this thing actually worked like magic! Recommended for all your heavy moving needs.
customer_reviews.author: Vegas LoVe Agent

customer_reviews.title: What a relief
customer_reviews.text: I've been pushing and pulling furniture around by myself for a long time. I've got to the point that my joints just can't do it any longer without asking for help. So I purchased the super sliders. I was skeptical at first but after positioning them under the furniture, all it took was one easy push and i was off. It was absolutely amazing! I was even able to maneuver my queen size bed without having to disassemble it. It as most definitely a huge relief the help I got from this simple item.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Quezada

customer_reviews.title: Not worth buying
customer_reviews.text: I had original set of super sliders. These are either knockoffs or the quality has fallen off. The sliding plastic is very thin, and fold when you put weight on them. They might work for office carpet, but if you have anything heavy that needs to be moved on a pile carpet or with padding, forget it, these will not work. very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Joe Football

customer_reviews.title: Made Heavy Furniture Easy to Move!
customer_reviews.text: I love these furniture sliders for carpet! I have a lot of heavy furniture and they made it super easy to slide across the carpet! I moved furniture in my living and dining room in less than 1 1/2 hours all by myself! They only reason it took longer is I needed to move the sliders between the furniture. I'm ordering extras so it will be even quicker next time!
customer_reviews.author: Boo

customer_reviews.title: Very good, mostly
customer_reviews.text: These sliders are working well, just wish the top-side foam part was stickier/tackier. Need them for a heavy chair with a big round wooden bottom, and if I push the chair fast at all, the sliders slip against the bottom of the chair about as much as they slip against the carpet. But as long as I slide the chair slowly, they seem to work/help. If I were sure of not needing them for sliding other things, I could glue them or use some kind of strong double-sided tape to help secure the top side of the sliders to the bottom of the chair.
customer_reviews.author: Devo

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I had to move two huge bookcase for carpet layers installing new carpet and purchased these hoping somehow such a simple thing could be for real. Otherwise I was going to have to disassemble them, seven pieces each in total. YES! These cabinets weigh at least four hundred pounds apiece and one of these on each corner allowed me and one helper to shove them across the carpet to the other side of the room and back as an assembly. Now that I have them I have also used them in the bedroom under dressers without unloading them. A great gadget that works!
customer_reviews.author: Old Retired Guy

customer_reviews.title: Makes life easier if you move furniture
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing if you need to move furniture on carpet. Place one under each leg, and even large, heavy sofas can be moved with one hand. If you like to re-arrange furniture or need to move it for carpet cleaning, these make the job faster and easier. I became acquainted with them on a shopping network and I have a lever that helps lift the furniture to place the sliders. But even if you have to lift by hand, these are a purchase you will not regret.
customer_reviews.author: Scrapbook Grandma

customer_reviews.title: Excited to use these.
customer_reviews.text: I personally haven't tried these yet, but we just had new carpeting installed and the installers moved an extremely heavy dresser across carpeting and tile (doesn't appear to be any scratches on tile) with this exact brand and size. I was stunned. I've wrestled with that dresser on several occasions as well as a Hope Chest and other heavy items that I now know will easily move with these sliders. They also moved a heavy treadmill that wouldn't roll through the doorway, so they just turned it sideways, slipped the sliders underneath and voila! Very impressed. Obviously wish I had known about these a long time ago. We also purchased the Super Sliders for "Hardwood" for our tile flooring.
customer_reviews.author: Kim  N.

customer_reviews.title: Freaking awesome
customer_reviews.text: They work exactly as described. We have a heavy piece of antique furniture that we needed to move. Far to heavy for my wife to help me with. Slid these things under each leg...and bam....it just easily slid across the floor. I am completely impressed with them. I'm sure there is a weight limit at some point or that it would be possible to break the plastic if you put something super super heavy on them - they aren't magic. But for 99% of your moving needs on carpet, can't really beat it.
customer_reviews.author: CQCoder

customer_reviews.title: Your back will thank you!
customer_reviews.text: makes no sense that Amazon asked me to rate sliders for "hardwood floors" because they are designed for carpet. If there as a rating for carpets, I'd rate sliders as 5 stars! Sliders work on the heaviest of furniture -- making it glide easily to wherever it needs to be. Don't strain yourself, get sliders. Your back will thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for me — the physically pffft!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a senior citizen and just moved into a house in a retirement community. I had a pretty good idea how I wanted the furniture arranged but, based on past experience, knew I would be wanting to try different arrangements. I had my young nephew help me put sliders under all of the heavier pieces and can now move them myself without any assistance. These things work great! I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: R. HurleyTop Contributor: Sewing

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I could not believe how easy these were to use. I’m a 76 year old women of slight build and I was able to move a triple dresser, two end tables, a large desk and two bachelor chest of drawers around tight corners and from one room to another. They slid very easily over carpet and wooden floor. I did take the drawers out beforehand as I couldn’t have lifted the furniture on to the sliders if I hadn’t. My husband was so surprised when he came home to see I had done it by myself.
customer_reviews.author: Susan R

customer_reviews.title: Slides easy
customer_reviews.text: The hardest thing for me was lifting the furniture up to slide them under it. I’m very tiny, but once I got them under, the furniture slid easy.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda M.

customer_reviews.title: Great sliders for heavy stuff
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to slide my gun safes around for our 33 mile move to the country. Great sliders for heavy stuff. Used them to get two gun safes out of a narrow closet. The safes weigh 500# and 650# each. I slid them both ou, by myself, on carpet to the tiled floor. Now, these things are not going to make moving 650# like moving 100#....I mean, it's still 650#! However, it did make it easier. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: James R Russell

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical because I have a super heavy tempur-pedic bed complete with a bed frame and moving my bed even just a few inches to get to the outlet behind the headboard was near impossible.. I did need help lifting the feet to slide these under but once in place I can move my bed by myself. Only drawback is that the discs are kind of bigger than I realized but that is my fault for not readying the product description. I placed the feed off center of the disc, almost to the edges so that most of the extra parts of the discs where under the bed. Even way off center like that they still work fine.
customer_reviews.author: K Van Schoonhoven

customer_reviews.title: These Work
customer_reviews.text: Every home owner should have these available. These really work for moving large furniture around to clean, paint or redecorate. Perfect for moving day! As a woman who likes to change out or rearrange my rooms these are perfect. For women or men who need to get stuff done without waiting for help these sliders are a "must have".
customer_reviews.author: CAG - NC

customer_reviews.title: They work.
customer_reviews.text: I was in denial that these would work, but I was able to easily move a 500 pound display cabinet across the house across carpet with ease. Where I had to cross a solid floor, I just used rugs as a bridge and kept going. They seem fairly durable. If that move didn’t break them, I don’t see how anything else will. Well worth the price for not having to injure myself slowly dragging a piece of furniture around.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn W.

customer_reviews.title: Great only for smooth flooring
customer_reviews.text: I pitched before I moved. Once I moved in I realized they do not slide whatsoever on irregular surface non slip tiles. What I needed were the expensive carpeted pads that slide on this type of flooring.
customer_reviews.author: Cyburbs

customer_reviews.title: A must buy for moving heavy furniture
customer_reviews.text: Love the movement with these larger sliders. Just a breeze moving heavy furniture with these under the legs. I had the regular round sliders,but they kept sliding off every time I tried to move the furniture. I will buy more. Second set bought, these are great for heavy sofa and love seat. I need four more sets for my heavy entertainment center. Then I will work on the bedroom furniture. A must buy for old ladies that have lost strength in their bodies.
customer_reviews.author: Johanna

customer_reviews.title: Great large size!
customer_reviews.text: I love these, especially the extra large size. I have to move furniture myself, so I simple lift up each corner, slid one under & push furniture around easily (on carpet). I have a 80 - 100 lb console that I couldn't even lift with another person. So once it was brought into my house, I was on my own. I placed these under & no problem moving it around on Carpet. Very handy for furniture that has all wood bottoms (as opposed to legs).
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Even if you can slide a chair or couch without these you will end up loosening the legs sooner or later. At 63 years old I needed to move a large love seat and couch after an operation and was not supposed to lift anything but all I need is to lift it enough to slide these under the legs and it was literally clear sailing. My wife was skeptical at first but when I moved a couch with ONE finger all could say was that I have been taking my vitamins.
customer_reviews.author: FR

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: We needed these to move 2 sets of wooden bunk beds away from windows that were due to be replaced. The beds were so heavy that we needed to use our car jack to get each post up to slip the sliders under. Once each leg was on a slider it took a little e effort to push it off of the depression the bed post had created in the carpet, but once that was done they slide with very little effort. We will be able to wait until the window installers arrive and the bunk beds can be easily moved to facilitate the installation of the replacement windows.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia O. Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Great Investment
customer_reviews.text: Our office was being painted and I bought these to move 4 tall 6ft filing cabinets. The facilities guys were so impressed with them that they got their boss to buy them a set before the remainder of the departments in our floor were painted. They had been using slider straps before this. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: SamB

customer_reviews.title: Moving Office Files
customer_reviews.text: I have an in-home office with 4 door file cabinets that are full. I am now on a carpeted floor but will be replaced with laminate soon. These have made the moving of heavy office equipment easier and do not have to worry about the dents left in flooring.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Opalecky

customer_reviews.title: Makes you feel like a superhero who can move heavy weight stuff around.
customer_reviews.text: Compact and a greatly useful product; if you are the kind of person who want to move heavy stuff around in your place without having those powerful arm muscles to flex around! We were able to use it to ( thankfully without twisting an ankle or pulling a muscle) rearrange really heavy furniture around the house using these simple but super helpful pads. Needless to say they don’t occupy space and are easy to store.
customer_reviews.author: mazon Customer 1011

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something that I could put under the feet of my large ottoman because I move it around on the carpet so I have room to workout. I put these under all four legs and now I just look at the ottoman and it moves. I settled on keeping two of these under one side and now it’s perfect and only moves when I want it too. They work great!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah K.

customer_reviews.title: Saved my broken back!
customer_reviews.text: I live alone with a really bad back and have nobody to help move furniture. I was able to slip these under a fully-assembled bunk bed, and easily slide it from one side of a bedroom to the other in seconds without even taking the mattresses off the bunk! We're talking about something that has to weigh well over 300 lbs! These little guys really bailed me out and saved me a lot of work! So happy I will have these whenever I need to move something across my carpeted apartment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Can't believe we lived without it
customer_reviews.text: These are strong and durable. Slide under the furniture that you want to move over carpet and push it gently. Let the furniture weight hold the sliders under it. If you push up then the sliders will slide off from underneath. But if you just gently push from the bottom, they hold well and move very heavy furniture over thick carpet perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Deal-Dude

customer_reviews.title: best movers  5 stars
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how I lived without them. My first time buying them. I am elderly and wanted to move a heavy table with drawers in it. Didn't even take out the drawers to make it lighter, with drawers in, after putting the movers in place, I could have used my little finger to move this item from one end of my home to the other, very easily. 5 stars plus.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine Pruiksma

customer_reviews.title: A moving lifesaver!
customer_reviews.text: We just had all of the floors in our house changed from carpet to vinyl wood planks. This meant we had to move every piece of furniture out into our garage. These sliders were a lifesaver. They made huge pieces like our couch, bookshelves and tables easy enough for 1 person to slide around with ease. Though I'm unsure if these are recommended for hard services (haven't re-checked the original product listing) after a couple of cautious tests on the new floor, we didn't notice any type of rub off or trail left and were able to use them to return all our furniture to their normal spaces. I'd buy these again in a second.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica A

customer_reviews.title: These are AMAZING - Buy a 2nd set (Soft-Bottom) for Hardwood Floors
customer_reviews.text: I had been using a previous set for YEARS and loved them - Use this version ONLY for Carpet.... I used on both CARPET and HARDWOOD Floors (NOT Recommended). The Plastic gets marks and can damage hardwood floors. Search same for Hardwood floors - They are AMAZING. SuperSliders 4705195N Reusable Furniture Movers for Hardwood Floors. One set of EACH is perfect for any home, as I can move anything with just my wife and I.
customer_reviews.author: Chicago

customer_reviews.title: Very Useful
customer_reviews.text: Bought these a couple of years ago & have used them repeatedly. They work well. The fact they're so big helps a lot. But... They're designed for use on wall-to-wall carpet. To avoid marking hardwood floors, put a sturdy piece of cloth underneath each (I've inserted mine into old cotton athletic socks, and they don't mark the floors at all).
customer_reviews.author: Robert E. McDowell

customer_reviews.title: Trusted and True
customer_reviews.text: I always love fresh new furniture sliders! I use them nearly daily in my business. eventually the backs get very scratched and worn out and dirty. But these guys are really thick and provide a lot of durability for moving furniture around on carpet! Nice to buy a trusted product at a great price from Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Buys Prime

customer_reviews.title: These furniture movers are the best I have found
customer_reviews.text: I needed to move my bed that has not been moved in several years and is impossible for one person to move. Someone suggested I get these movers to put under the legs of the bed and it worked beautifully. I was able to move the bed with one hand. I like the shape and size of the movers. They fit easily under any type of furniture. Makes it easy on the back.....I would definitely recommend these furniture movers to anyone looking to make moving heavy furniture a breeze to do. No help needed. The price is reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: kathy  c

customer_reviews.title: This makes moving a breeze
customer_reviews.text: This has made moving furniture in my apartment such a breeze. My friend who was helping me had never seen these in action and was very impressed. Get them, use them. You will be so glad.
customer_reviews.author: MSK16

customer_reviews.title: Awesome & Must Have!
customer_reviews.text: Just recently went through a move and I borrowed a friend's sliders. They were so incredibly helpful that I went and bought these. They allow heavy objects to be moved without the need for two people and you don't even break a sweat either. I've already found multiple uses for them, a must have for all!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan B

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. As I get older moving furniture becomes an issue. I bought these sliders to help me move some very heavy dressers. WHAT A GREAT PRODUCT...the move was very easy coming out of a carpeted room onto a tile floor and back onto tile. Highly recommend to anyone wanting to move furniture when you have no one to help you!
customer_reviews.author: Dave H.

customer_reviews.title: Finally a pad you can place with your foot
customer_reviews.text: The larger area allows you to place the slider with your foot easier in the rare event you are the only Mohican in the moving job. Then it seems like less chance for it to slip off of the slider than most so there - two good things about a good thing and anything that saves my back can be unequivocably defined as good.
customer_reviews.author: B Decent

customer_reviews.title: Highly Rated!
customer_reviews.text: It is SO easy to maneuver furniture with these sliders! I got the idea from the men who installed our carpets recently. They used these and so I ordered some for our house. We are not as young and strong as we used to be, so having sliders under a lot of the heavy furniture pieces is great!
customer_reviews.author: Lahree

customer_reviews.title: Making moving furniture so much easier.
customer_reviews.text: I recently moved into a house after a lifetime of apartment living. Movers can only take you so far and I have LOVED having these to move things around within rooms or across my house. As a single lady these have been a life saver in keeping my plans for unpacking on track without needing to call in help.
customer_reviews.author: CarrieB

customer_reviews.title: They worked great.
customer_reviews.text: I like old refurbished furniture but the pieces are heavy. The last time I moved a very large cabinet I had to call a friend with a moving dolly. This time I used these and it slid so easily I was amazed. They aren’t built to be left under furniture indefinitely. That’s why some people complain about them cracking. Take them out and they’ll last a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Mckercher

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: Worked super well. Was able to seamlessly move a heavy dresser with little to no effort. These are designed for carpet! I knew that but saw people complaining about hardwood floors which these are not intended for use on.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Enaenables a one-person furniture rearrangement.
customer_reviews.text: Holy moly! Just got out of a cast after 10 weeks and frustration over not being able to organize my living room and dining room. Put these under the couch and I can push it around with one arm. Unbelievable. First saw them when carpet layer's came to our house. We have a 100 year-old secretary, that is big and heavy. One scrawny 20-something shoved in around by himself with these gliders underneath. We just had to have some. I recommend anybody getting some especially when you're looking at aging.
customer_reviews.author: Anne O'Neill

customer_reviews.title: perfect for the job
customer_reviews.text: I have a backup battery for a medical device. If our power goes out, I'll need to move it across the room from where it sits being charged, to where we need to plug the device into it. Only, the battery weighs a TON--I can't possibly lift it. These sliders have made it possible for me to drag it across the carpet, which is a tremendous help.
customer_reviews.author: MaryMc

customer_reviews.title: These sliders are so easy to use
customer_reviews.text: These furniture sliders are so easy to use and makes the moving of heavy objects possible for us women. Have had sliders before but were smaller ones. Decided to get this size, glad I did they work perfectly. If object can be tilted enough to put sliders under corners, then just give a little push on object and it slides across floor (especially carpet).
customer_reviews.author: Cinderilla

customer_reviews.title: Terrific for moving furniture, etc.
customer_reviews.text: Tired of trying to move furniture and appliances by the back strain method? These sliders allow the moving of items weighing 200-300 lbs (and more). I put them under a huge, heavy cabinet and pushed it across the room with only a small amount of effort. If you haven't used these before you will be surprised at their effectiveness. My petite wife and daughter moved furniture with them. Made me smile!
customer_reviews.author: RML

customer_reviews.title: Makes moving furniture so easy!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of those “life hack” items that everyone can use! I purchased them when we were rearranging furniture (had to move items across carpet) and it made moving items such as heavy dressers and bookcases a breeze! My husband and daughter moved a piece which they wouldn’t have been able to do without these. They slid easily over the carpet, no damage at all, and no back breaking lifting! I wish I had purchased these years ago when we were moving into our house!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Chu

customer_reviews.title: Great for those who cannot move heavy furniture arround
customer_reviews.text: I have a mother who has SEVER back issues. she could easily push, pull and move a dresser on carpeted floor like it was nothing! love this product and would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Berto

customer_reviews.title: These furniture sliders work great!
customer_reviews.text: I have a very restricted lift order from my doctor. These sliders make moving furniture easy and safe. All you do is tip each corner of the item, kick the slider under each corner and gently side the item wherever needed. There is no strain on your back or danger to brittle bones. Great product!!
customer_reviews.author: customer

customer_reviews.title: INCREDIBLE!!!
customer_reviews.text: These little things are incredible! We bought them awhile back and had not used them until last night. We were rearranging the living room furniture and it was a breeze to move a king size sleeper sofa, an overstuffed love seat and 2 recliners using these. Very impressed with them. You may find them cheaper (same brand) at Harbor Freight on a sidekick display, they also have different shapes and sizes of them.
customer_reviews.author: StampingScrapbookingMom

customer_reviews.title: Works great well worth having
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what was needed to move a Bar out of the way for large appliance delivery. It helps to have 2 people because once pads on one side your furniture could slide placing on opposite side. We we're amazed how well these worked. Kept hard shell package for storage after use.
customer_reviews.author: WeShopWeBuyCADreaming

customer_reviews.title: They work great to move large furniture.
customer_reviews.text: These sliders are terrific and make it so easy to move large furniture. Purchased specifically to move a heavy gazebo on our wood deck. Placed one under each of the support poles and dang if it didn't make it a breeze to move and it didn't scratch the stain. Would buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: kate

customer_reviews.title: Worked great!
customer_reviews.text: We had an old set of furniture movers similar to this but they were scuffed up on the bottom and had seen better days. I needed to move a dual reclining couch and dual reclining power love seat. They are HEAVY. I positioned these in the middle under the front and back frame and away we went! They worked great. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely perfect!!!
customer_reviews.text: These worked perfect. Jacked up my pool table, placed one of these under each foot and slid the whole pool table myself all the way across the basement (40 feet).
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Truby

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for heavy items
customer_reviews.text: I used all 4 under my foldup treadmill that's in a small carpeted room. I can position the treadmill out of the way when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Edwin C. Collins

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver! No pain. No damage.
customer_reviews.text: I wish I would’ve purchased these a long time ago. They made moving my heavy bedroom furniture a breeze. Once they were placed under the furniture I was able to move my bed and dresser by myself. My furniture is solid wood and heavy (dresser filled with clothes and things).
customer_reviews.author: ZeeMa7

customer_reviews.title: An invaluable tool around our house.
customer_reviews.text: My spouse and I are both disabled and have just purchased new but very heavy furniture..a recliner and loveseat. With these I can move them out of the way to clean and vacuum quite easily. I also used them under our king size bed to rearrange and clean in the master bedroom. Furniture slides super smoothly on carpet, making my job much nicer.
customer_reviews.author: E. Briones

customer_reviews.title: Perfect slider for my desk.
customer_reviews.text: I bought a portable desk that I move back and forth daily across carpet in our small house since I have no extra room for an office. My desk had wheels, one promptly broke off about 3-4 weeks after buying it. Bummer. But, the wheels keep its legs from fitting under the couch or my stability ball anyway so it worked out. Anyway, I had the smaller round version of these, which are great btw, but just were constantly coming out when I moved the desk. I needed something longer. I tried felt. Didn't work on carpet. Bummer. Then I found the longer wider version of my round ones. So happy. They work great. Slide perfect. Cannot be more happy.
customer_reviews.author: tracy

customer_reviews.title: High quality and very useful.  The description is dead on.
customer_reviews.text: Everyone needs at least one set of these at their house. I have a very heavy and fully loaded dresser with a big mirror/shelves on it. I literally had to use a leverage bar as a jack just to get the dresser the approximately 1/4" off the floor to get these under it. Once they were under the dresser they stayed in place where i put them and then i literally moved the entire dresser with one hand. I used very little effort with the one hand. Amazing and I highly recommend everyone to get these. The quality in the materials used on them seems very sturdy also. I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Furniture sliders
customer_reviews.text: We had to move all of our furniture to have new carpeting installed. The sliders worked great! They moved our heavy hutch and two leather couches. We left the sliders under the hutch for easy moving whenever the need comes about. Definitely work and highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: In the Town

customer_reviews.title: they work really well
customer_reviews.text: Packaging was great. I use them under the legs of my Pilates Reformer as there's carpet in the room. My unit is very heavy because of the jump board and tower with lots of weighted springs. These gliders re amazing. I push the long cumbersome reformer with one hand and it slides very easily. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gets the Job Done Well
customer_reviews.text: First of all, the lack of excessive packaging materials was a plus in my book -- it's nice to not have a huge pile of garbage after opening a small, light parcel. These work just as advertised -- slide them under, and away you go without hurting your back or straining overly much. Durable, easy to clean, and certainly affordable. I use an old pillow case to keep them together, as the cardboard-and-plastic packaging is not for re-use.
customer_reviews.author: Wilson Fletcher

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!! Slid a king bed w/ ease
customer_reviews.text: I needed help moving a solid wood king bed. It was to heavy to even budge on my own. These were the perfect size to go under the larger feet my bed has. I needed help lifting the bed to get them under but once they were in place I could move the bed w/ ease to paint behind. I ended up leaving then in place so I could move it in the future to clean behind.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Little power houses!
customer_reviews.text: We are remodeling and painting rooms in our home and need to move furniture. These are great for moving large and heavy furniture. We used them to move a large fireplace/t.v. stand that was fully loaded and were able to slide it across the carpet with ease. So impressed that I ordered a second set for use in other rooms.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Other uses
customer_reviews.text: purchased these to move furniture in my new house then I discovered they work great as exercise sliders also thanks for the great product
customer_reviews.author: Stephen J

customer_reviews.title: They work
customer_reviews.text: They just work, they are ALOT bigger than i expected, but I used them to slide some tables around and man, it went from being a nightmare to move them, to being able to casually adjust them with one hand. My heavy coffee table that has my TV and stereo on it is now a breeze to move back and forth as needed.
customer_reviews.author: James Guerra

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable - really works!!
customer_reviews.text: I had my doubts about this product but was amazed at how well it truly works. We had new carpet installed and used mover dolly wheels to relocated several heavy items - china hutch - t.v. stand with all the equipment in place. It was a real pain. We ordered these and received them in one day. That evening I was able to move the same units all by myself. Simply lifted the corner of each item and nudged the pad in with my foot - and then zoom!! across the carpet I went. Fantastic product. Not sure how long they'll last but it's not something most of us use every day
customer_reviews.author: OldsDude

customer_reviews.title: Exercise
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for exercise stuff instead of buying the floor sliders that are marketed for workouts. These were a much better price, and a bit more solid. Great on carpet to make push-ups a bit more challenging, or for doing any number of things where the feet may need to slide.
customer_reviews.author: David Aleshire

customer_reviews.title: I’ll never move furniture without them again
customer_reviews.text: If you’ve never used furniture sliders, you need to. I’m a small woman, 5’2” with chronic back pain. I usually would have to call my boyfriend every time I wanted to vaccuum behind my dresser. Now I can move furniture so easily. I rearranged my room all by myself!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Everyone Needs These!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best “tool” I never knew existed, just tilt your furniture to place and slide away. We recently moved and my real estate agent used these to move our furniture when selling our house. I bought a set and now we can move all our heavy wood furniture easily around. No more groaning when it comes to wanting to try a different set-up! FYI - this specific one works on carpet, not hardwood so you’d need a different type of moving pad if you weren’t on carpet.
customer_reviews.author: PrincessKateTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Great for heavy furniture on carpet.
customer_reviews.text: We have a very heavy chest/coffee table (over 65 lbs) with casters that is very hard to move. We swapped the casters out for solid legs and put these underneath and now we can move it with one hand across the carpet. I can’t recommend these enough.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Crafton

customer_reviews.title: Moved heavy home gym
customer_reviews.text: I had to move a heavy home gymnasium weighing hundreds of pounds across a carpeted area. I picked up the Super Sliders as a last ditch effort before trying to dismantle the thing. It took two people and a crowbar, but we were able to slide these underneath the gym’s feet. Much to my amazement, these sliders worked. Gym successfully moved!
customer_reviews.author: Deb L

customer_reviews.title: Too thin and weak
customer_reviews.text: These SuperSliders are too thin and fragile to support the weight of a queen size bed. I am not sure whether I should change or return it .
customer_reviews.author: geow888

customer_reviews.title: What did I do without these?
customer_reviews.text: Best thing to have in the house, if you are moving if you are not moving, if you want to clean, if you want to rearrange...great to have
customer_reviews.author: Julie Julie Julie

customer_reviews.title: These are incredible and really work
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic. I would never believe that I weighing at 125 pounds could push my extremely heavy sofa on carpet. But I did, easily. Slid like on glass. The hardest part was getting the sliders under the legs since I worked alone, so lifting my heavy sofa and trying to get them under with my knee or quickly holding up sofa with one hand took some time but did get them under. Working with another person would be much quicker and easier. But its doable alone. I love these and now I can move my furniture around any time I want. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mare

customer_reviews.title: Great help
customer_reviews.text: I keep some of these under my couch and loveseat legs so that I can easily move them to vacuum without any extra help. The skirts cover them and it makes it easy since I had back surgery 9 years ago. I use these when moving any heavy furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Kdh

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I have an extremely heavy, well built, couch. It has metal bar going all the way across in both front and back. Has been terrible trying to move it for vacuuming. I used other furniture movers (smaller) and they didn't do the job. These worked GREAT after using 8 of them. The metal bar had 8 different places that stuck into the carpet. I can now move the couch easily on my own. Does that mean I have to vacuum under it more often? Darn! Lol
customer_reviews.author: kathleen9074

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: I have a thick carpet and my brother is using a cheap collapsible card table as his office desk. While pushing it forward to stand up, the legs were close to breaking. I tried some sliders I already had but the table was too light. These worked perfectly. I'll ordered more to put under furniture.
customer_reviews.author: G. Dancy

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to yse
customer_reviews.text: Ok so my girlfriend who works for a furniture company uses these all the time. She brought them to my house because she was helping me stage my home for selling. After seeing and using hers I ordered my own. Really helpful to use for any large item in your home. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Lora M. Bailin

customer_reviews.title: Used these as sliders when working out during Covid
customer_reviews.text: Everything ran out in the workout dept in march, 2020, so I had to get creative for sliders. These worked pretty well. Put a lite spray of silicon and slid easily. In work out room I have old junky carpets I don't really care about.
customer_reviews.author: luckyfeet

customer_reviews.title: Back saver!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these on a whim when we were moving. We have a very heavy bedroom set and our new house had all carpet in the bedrooms which makes rearranging furniture much more difficult. These made moving furniture a breeze. Just put the movers under the foot of the bed. My 60 year old mother in law and myself were able to completely rearrange 2 bedrooms in under 20 minutes. The only "CON" is one of the bureaus I had didn't have actual legs and more of a square base. We just put it on the corners of the unit, but it wasn't as easy to move, but still made it MUCH easier than it would have been.
customer_reviews.author: Otlndrgirl

customer_reviews.title: Makes moving couches and cleaning easier.
customer_reviews.text: Makes moving and cleaning much easier. I leave them under my couches permanently. Well made and strong.
customer_reviews.author: charles reinhardt

customer_reviews.title: Easy to move large furniture
customer_reviews.text: My office recently re-did ALL flooring, both carpets and ceramic tile. These sliders made the whole project a breeze. A slight tilt of even the heaviest piece of furniture, slide one under each corner, and the furniture moved quickly and easily. Our flooring contractor estimated 8 business days to complete our project, but me (59 yrs old) and another employee were able to stay one step ahead of the contractors by clearing the furniture out of each room ourselves, leaving the workers free to only work on the flooring. The entire project was done in 3 days, not 8!! Buy these!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: I have deep pile carpet and I couldn't move my sofa, with these I can move it by myself.
customer_reviews.author: CA

product_meta.title: SuperSliders 4704095N Reusable XL Heavy Furniture Sliders for Carpet- Quickly and Easily Move Any Item, 9-1/2” x 5-3/4” Linen (4 Pack)
product_meta.description:
Size Name:4 Pack| Color Name:LinenMake moving furniture the easiest part of your move or remodel with these reusable SuperSliders Furniture movers. Simply put them under your large and heavy items and they’ll help you quickly and easily move your items across carpeted surfaces. Made of hard plastic and durable rubber foam, these oval-shaped furniture sliders provide proper weight distribution and a secure grip, making it easy to move furniture into just the right place…or maybe just a little more to the left. The hard plastic bottom also protects your carpeted surfaces from damage caused by moving furniture. They’re reusable, too, so you can remove them after moving your items to use again and again, or leave them in place for future moving or cleaning – yep, it’s not just you who likes to rearrange furniture every few months. They’re a great accessory for making cleaning day a breeze and cleaning those hard to reach spaces, too. SuperSliders are the #1 best-selling and most trusted furniture mover on the market today -- offering superior quality and long-lasting performance for all of your furniture moving and floor protection needs. Each pack includes 4 hard plastic sliders and furniture movers, measuring 9-1/2” x 5-3/4” – they’re an essential purchase for every household!

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Super Sliders allow you to move your heavy furniture quickly and easily on carpeted surfaces in your home. Super Sliders offer superior quality, innovation and longevity for all your furniture moving and floor protection needs.
feature_bullets: MOVE FURNITURE EASILY - Moving furniture can be the worst part of a move or remodel – but not with these resuable SuperSliders furniture movers. Simply put them under your large, heavy items to quickly and easily move them across carpeted surfaces

PERFECT FOR ALL FURNITURE - There is no piece of furniture too large or heavy for these furniture sliders. Use them on all your favorite items, including tables, sofas, beds, dressers, recliners, heavy appliances and more

MOVE HEAVY FURNITURE EASILY - You’ll be pleasantly surprised at how easy it is to move your heavy furniture perfectly into place, because the oval shape of the furniture movers provides proper weight distribution and the durable rubber foam provides a secure grip

REUSABLE FOR CLEANING OR FUTURE MOVING - Rearranging your furniture is a breeze thanks to these reusable furniture sliders – leave them under your items for easy future moving and cleaning or remove them to use again and again
BEST-SELLING PRODUCT - Each pack includes 4 pieces of the #1 best-selling and most trusted hard plastic sliders and furniture movers, measuring 9-1/2” x 5-3/4”
